details.title: Wedding Details
details.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our special day

ceremonyReception.ceremonyDescription: Our ceremony will take place at {venueName} in Wiener Wald. The outdoor setting provides a romantic backdrop as we exchange our vows.
ceremonyReception.receptionDescription: Following the ceremony, join us for cocktails, dinner, and dancing under the stars in the palace ballroom.

dressCode.title: Dress Code
dressCode.description: We're going elegant! Think cocktail dresses, suits, and your finest evening wear. The ceremony will be outdoors, so consider comfortable shoes for the garden setting.
dressCode.noteText: We kindly request that guests refrain from wearing white, cream, or ivory to allow our bride to shine.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: We've hired professional photographers to capture every moment of our special day. To ensure they can do their best work and that we can all be truly present:
photography.unpluggedText: Please keep phones and cameras away during the ceremony
photography.professionalText: Will be shared with all guests after the wedding

registry.title: Registry & Gifts
registry.description: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we've registered at a few of our favorite stores.

weather.title: Weather Considerations
weather.description: June weather in Vienna is typically beautiful, but we have an indoor backup plan in case of rain. Bring a light jacket for the evening.

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Free parking is available at the venue. Valet service will be provided. We also recommend taxi services for those who wish to enjoy the open bar!

children.title: Children
children.description: While we love your little ones, we've decided to make our wedding an adults-only celebration. We hope this gives parents a night off to relax!

dietary.title: Dietary Requirements
dietary.description: Please let us know of any dietary restrictions or allergies when you RSVP. We'll work with our caterers to accommodate all needs.

quickLinks.title: Join Us in Celebrating
quickLinks.description: We're so excited to share our special day with you. Please explore our website for all the details you'll need.
